title: Dead Prez Project (visited)
name: Dead Prez Project (visited)
description:
A Map by Jprossjr

We are on a quest to visit the gravesite of every dead U.S. President.  This map shows all of the dead presidents we have been to so far.

properties.name: Dead President Abraham Lincoln Gravesite
properties.description: Posted by Jprossjr1441 Monument Ave Springfield, IL 62702We visited Dead President Lincoln in September 1999. He was our first dead president, and it was while we were there that we conceived the idea for the Dead Presidents Project.

properties.name: Dead President Benjamin Harrison Gravesite
properties.description: Posted by Jprossjr700 W 38th St, Indianapolis, INWe first visited Dead President B. Harrison\'s grave on October 28, 2002 with Ellie. He was our 5th dead president visited. We returned on April 2, 2005 with Margaret, Ryan, Shea, John, and Chloe.

properties.name: Dead President Dwight Eisenhower Gravesite
properties.description: Posted by Jprossjr200 SE 4th St, abilene, ks, 67410We visited Dead President Eisenhower on September 18, 2000. He was our 2nd dead president visited.

properties.name: Dead President Herbert Hoover Gravesite
properties.description: Posted by Jprossjr302 Parkside Drive, West Branch, IA, 52358We visited Dead Prez Hoover on July 25, 2005. He was our 7th dead president.

properties.name: Dead President James Garfield Gravesite
properties.description: Posted by Jprossjr41.51, -81.5917We visited Dead President Garfield on September 29, 2001. He was our 3rd dead president.

properties.name: Dead President Richard Nixon Gravesite
properties.description: Posted by Jprossjr18001 Yorba Linda Blvd, yorba linda, ca 92886We visited Dead President Nixon on March 28, 2004. He was our 6th dead president visited.

properties.name: Dead President Ronald Reagan Gravesite
properties.description: Posted by Jprossjr40 Presidential Drive, Simi Valley, CAWe visited Dead President Reagan on June 24, 2006.

properties.name: Dead President Warren G. Harding Gravesite
properties.description: Posted by Jprossjr40.5733, -83.1233We visited Dead Prez Harding on November 25, 2005 with Paul, Ryan, Shea, John and Chloe. He was our 8th dead president visited.

properties.name: Dead President William Henry Harrison Gravesite
properties.description: Posted by Jprossjr45052We visited Dead Prez W.H. Harrison on October 26, 2002 with Suzy, Jeff and Chelsea. He was our 4th dead president visited.

properties.name: Dead President Zachary Taylor Gravesite
properties.description: Posted by Jprossjr4701 Brownsboro Rd, St. Matthews, KY, 40207We visited Dead President Taylor on June 9, 2007 with Mom & Dad Ross. He was our 10th Dead President visited.
